article.title: Dulcimer
article.paragraph: DabConceptExpandFile:Early_dulcimer_made_in_Belgium.jpgthumbrightEarly Belgian Dulcimer (or Hackebrett) from the Hans Adler collection.Adulcimeris a kind of stringed musical instrument.Among its types are:

list.listitem: Hammered dulcimer, free-standing, trapezoidal, with horizontal strings struck by handheld "hammers"
Fretted, generally played on the lap by plucking, i.e.
Banjo dulcimer, with banjo-like resonating membrane
Resonator dulcimer, with inset conical resonator
Bowed dulcimer, teardrop-shaped and played upright with a bow
